title: Hover Card
description: For sighted users to preview content available behind a link.

body.raw:
## Installation 1. Install the `@radix-ui/react-hover-card` component from radix-ui: ```bash npm install @radix-ui/react-hover-card ``` 2. Copy and paste the following code into your project. This is the `` primitive. You can place it in a file at `components/ui/hover-card.tsx`. ## Usage ```tsx import { HoverCard, HoverCardContent, HoverCardTrigger, } from "@/components/ui/hover-card" ``` ```tsx Hover
